Bluejay

A mobile-first css framework developed by Kaleb Heitzman using Sass and CSS3 tricks of the trade. Use it in your next project.

Bluejay also uses some Zepto too for Overlays, Scrolling, etc.

  • Grid
  • Forms
  • Buttons
  • Menus
  • Tables

Bluejay

A mobile-first CSS3 framework developed by Kaleb Heitzman

Example of a div that stretches to the fullsize of the view port using the .viewport class.

Grid

A mobile first grid with sensible breakpoints and
push and pull columns to create semantic layouts.


.col-1
.col-1-2 .push-1-2
.col-1-2 .pull-1-2
